Description:
Isaac (Wei-Chun) Huang is a multidisciplinary Taiwanese designer with backgrounds in industrial design and computer science. He is interested in technology and likes to bring innovative ideas to life. He doesn’t really like rules and doesn’t mind breaking them if necessary. 

Before studying Innovation Design Engineering. He and his partner won a pitch and got fund from the Taiwan Ministry of Culture and founded a company which committed to original design and "Made-in-Taiwan" illustrated goods.

Education.School: Royal College of Art / Imperial College London
Education.Additional: Scholarship: GSSA, Ministry of Education, Taiwan

Education.Degree: BSc, Computer Science and Information Engineering

Experience.Title: Teaching Assistant
Experience.Company name: Department of Industrial Design, National Cheng Kung University

Experience.Title: Executive Editor
Experience.Company name: College of Planning & Design, National Cheng Kung University

Experience.Title: Assistant
Experience.Company name: Economic Development Section of Daan District Office, Taipei City
